# AsepriteSheet.SaveAsPng method

Writes the pixel data for this [`AsepriteSheet`](../AsepriteSheet.md) to disk as a PNG file.

```csharp
public void SaveAsPng(string path)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| path | The absolute path location to save the generated PNG file to. |
